## RestTransferStateService.set() method

Sets value to be stored with specified key, and returns self

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(key: string, value: any): RestTransferStateService;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>string</code> | Key for storing value |
|  value | <code>any</code> | Value that is going to be stored |

<b>Returns:</b>

`RestTransferStateService`
